definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

sentences.english: C. Offer water or juice to help client swallow medications.
sentences.chinese: 用水或液體幫助病人呑藥。

sentences.english: Leave the laundry in the laundry bag behind the door of the bathroom.
sentences.chinese: 把待洗的衣旅敢呑洗澡間門後的洗衣袋裏就行了。

sentences.english: Pinocytosis : Fluid or particles are engulfed by a cell.
sentences.chinese: 胞飲作用胞飲指細胞呑入液體或微粒。

sentences.english: Caution client against chewing or swallowing lozenges .
sentences.chinese: 提醒病人不能咀嚼或呑咽錠劑。

sentences.english: G. Caution client against chewing or swallowing lozenges.
sentences.chinese: 提醒病人不能咀嚼或呑咽錠劑。

sentences.english: Add sauces and gravies to meats, and cut meats into small pieces to make them easy to swallow.
sentences.chinese: 往肉里加上湯汁調料，把肉切成小塊，以方便呑咽。

sentences.english: Fluid or particles are engulfed by a cell.
sentences.chinese: 胞飲作用胞飲指細胞呑入液體或微粒。

definition: ghost of sb devoured by a tiger who helps the tiger devour others
to speak evil/gobbling sound made by ducks
number 20 of the 28 constellations 二十八宿, approx. Orion 獵戶座|猎户座
variant of 嘴, mouth/beak/spout (of teapot etc)
